english: Every night in my dreams, I see you, I feel you.
chinese: 每晚在梦中，我见到你，感受你。

english: That is how I know you go on.
Far across the distance and spaces between us,​
chinese: 跨越遥远的距离和时空，

english: You have come to show you go on.

chinese: 无论远近，无论你在何方，

english: I believe that the heart does go on.
Once more, you open the door,​
And you're here in my heart,​
And my heart will go on and on.
